website_summaries.verdict: A classic table that looks great in a game room.
pros: An elegant hardwood table that plays well
3 different finish options for a glossy surface
cons: may have bumps on playing surface

customer_reviews.title: Product came dirty with parts falling off
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the package the material surrounding the playing surface had several greasy hand prints that will not come off. In addition, the bars on the bottom used to keep the board from warping were not tightened. One fell off on the ground and the box was full of loose nuts and washers. Another was just about to fall off. Clearly this item missed the last stage where the nuts are tightened and there must have been no quality control inspection. The item arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: ronald darling

customer_reviews.title: This table is fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: This table is fantastic... and an incredible bargain! It plays as well as any bar table I've ever played on, and it has made our basement entertainment room a real hub of activity! You can pay a whole lot more, but strictly from the gaming perspective, this is absolutely a great table!! Be advised... I bought the 16' and it is heavy. You'll need some help to unbox it, get the legs on, and get it upright where you want to position it without damaging it. I had three strong people... four would have been better and a bit safer for the table itself.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Table is good, but it came cracked and the pucks were ...
customer_reviews.text: Table is good, but it came cracked and the pucks were not the right colors. There were 6 red and 2 blue, instead of 4 of each.
customer_reviews.author: A. W. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Shuffleboard Deluxe!
customer_reviews.text: Not every day you get a shuffleboard delivered to your house! Amazon did it right! Even offered set up! Great addition to the home and year round fun! Easy set up, was well packed and plays great! Very nice recreational table!
customer_reviews.author: Suffleboard Bear

customer_reviews.title: poor communication with shipper
customer_reviews.text: poor communication with shipper. could not track. the table is excellent and very easy to put together. would like to have something on the rules and care of the table. the table is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: yendlo

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Love this table -- we purchased this 14 foot shuffle board table and had a family Christmas Party. Everyone played it from my 8 year old grandson to the older adults. The table was fairly easy to put together, a little tricky to level it so that the discs slide evenly. We did get it level and so far have really enjoyed playing. You don't need an special skills to play the game, ages 5 to 95. Would highly recommend this table -lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: David Rice

customer_reviews.title: Overall we like it. However there is a few problems
customer_reviews.text: Overall we like it. However there is a few problems. The butcher block is separating in several places.and raising up causing an uneven playing surface. Yes we have a dehumidifier and keep it around 50. The other thing is it needs bolt covers on leg fastening bolts. Sincerely Fran
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Table, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table for the money. Friends ask "how much was that $4k" and they're surprised to hear it was less than half that. You will need 3 others to bring it in and help set up.
customer_reviews.author: BRAD K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just a great shuffleboard table. Very heavy and well-made. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice playfield
customer_reviews.text: We received out first board but the play area was warped. I contacted Amazon and they brought a new table quickly. the replacement top is perfect...slide a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Couple minor flaws on the playing surface but didn't affect game play.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: awesome suffleboard table.
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for a long room in my house which i had no idea what to use it for but this made a great addition to the house. Family and friends love playing on it and the game never gets old. This table is a quality made gameroom product.
customer_reviews.author: Yoda796

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: table is actually not very smooth at all. The pucks literally bounce down the board. Quality is subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Georgetown 14 ft
customer_reviews.text: Received very fast, Truck driver assisted in unloading,setup was easy. I just enjoyed a night of friends enjoying. I would recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: BobW

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Missing Items
customer_reviews.text: The shuffleboard table was ordered along with a ping pong table. Both were large and heavy items. They were delivered together by one person who was unable to get them off the truck himself without my help. Upon inspection, the shuffleboard was missing one of the legs, all of the assembly items as well as the pucks. One of the two legs (of what were supposed to be 3) that did arrive was cracked/damaged. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: When it showed it was broken in five different place's so i sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Russell Davies

product_meta.title: Playcraft Georgetown Shuffleboard Table
product_meta.description: Hand stained and rubbed burnished hardwood veneer available in Cherry, Espresso or Honey. Solid hardwood corners and rail caps, and carpeted gutters. 1-3/4" thick solid single stave butcher block playfield finished with 10 coats of polyurethane to create a smooth, glossy surface. Traditional indoor 1-2-3 scoring system on 12' lengths and 1-2-3-4 on 14' and 16' lengths. Climate adjuster system for shaping the playfield profile. Rigid, reinforced double-paneled box legs with in leg storage, 6" leg levelers and deluxe hardwood abacus scorers. Playing equipment includes, set of (8) 2-1/8" deluxe playing weights - 4 blue, 4 red and speed wax. Total weight : 260 pounds.
feature_bullets: Edge Glued Vertical Stave Butcher Block
